footerTitle: Everything to serve you in one place. Easier use, greater success with HomeFix.
hero_description: We provide top-notch home repair services to keep your house in perfect condition.

features.whyDesc: The perfect solution for service providers to manage their business effectively and meet customer requests efficiently. HomeFix allows you to add your services, such as property painting, carpentry, electrical work, and other specialties you offer. You can manage your appointments flexibly, accept or reject requests, and track their status with ease.
features.description1: Ease of tracking every order from the moment it is placed until it reaches the customer, with instant notifications for every update.
features.description2: The application allows you to manage your services efficiently, track orders in real-time, and improve your performance to provide a professional experience for customers.
features.description3: We ensure the protection of your data and the privacy of your customers using advanced security technologies.

Services.subtitle1: Repairing leaks, installing and maintaining pipes and sanitary ware.
Services.subtitle2: Installing and adjusting satellite systems and channel reception.
Services.subtitle3: Repairing electrical faults, installing and maintaining electrical wiring and devices.
Services.subtitle4: Maintaining and repairing electrical appliances such as washing machines and refrigerators.
Services.subtitle5: Dismantling, assembling, and moving furniture and belongings safely and professionally.
Services.subtitle6: Interior and exterior painting and finishing works for homes.
Services.subtitle7: Installing and maintaining air conditioning and cooling systems.
Services.subtitle8: Safe pest and insect control services for homes.
Services.subtitle10: Professional cleaning services for homes and offices.
Services.subtitle11: Repairing and maintaining furniture and wooden works.
Services.subtitle12: Installing and maintaining security surveillance systems.
Services.subtitle13: Installing and maintaining tiles and flooring.
Services.subtitle14: Designing, installing, and maintaining ceilings and facades.

Works.title: Latest Works
Works.Desc: !We provide a glimpse of our latest home repair and maintenance projects
Works.title1: Repair and restoration of ceilings and walls
Works.title3: Installation and maintenance of floors and windows
Works.title4: Redesign and renovation of interior decorations
Works.title5: Repairing doors, leaks, and structural damages
